nodes.text: Assault Team Two, along with Assault Team One, was ordered, by Force Commander Thrawn of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force, to preform an out-hull operation on a Vagaari gravity projector's port side during the Battle of the Geroon homeworld. They then located and neutralized the crew aboard the projector with minimal damage to the projector itself. After that they assisted Chief Engineer Yal'avi'kema in collapsing the projector.
